title: Bryce Canyon National Park: Park Fun
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Park Fun               Park Fun        Come visit us during the annual Astronomy and Geology Festival. NPS Photo       Hey kids! Bryce Canyon National Park is an especially fun place for kids; we would love to see you here! If you'd like to find out more about what kids can do when visiting our Park, check out our For Kids site. Right now, we have some fun online pages:        Geodetective Logo   Geodetectives Do you like geology? How about dinosaurs? If so, you could be a Geodetective by solving a mystery or two from earth history. How will you solve the mystery? Professor Allister Holmes McFragilis and his crew of dinosaurs will help you! Elementary, my dear Watson!         Lightning Safety What is lightning safety? Do you know how to be safe during thunderstorms in Bryce Canyon? When thunder roars, Go Indoors! Find out by visiting our Don't Get Zapped! website. Then take the Quiz and print a Certificate for yourself!
